author: Dov Lieber
title: Israel Says It Destroyed Syrian Nuclear Reactor in 2007
text:
Israel on Wednesday acknowledged that it destroyed a Syrian nuclear reactor in 2007, ending a decadelong silence over the airstrikes in what it said was a warning for an increasingly bellicose Iran.

The Israeli military disclosed for the first time details about the 2007 operation, releasing previously classified information, pictures and video of the airstrikes. Israel Katz, the country’s chief of intelligence, said on Twitter that the decision to destroy the Syrian reactor “sends a clear message: Israel will never allow...
